translations: v.（蔗糖、糖浆）变成焦糖；给（水果等）裹上焦糖（等于 caramelize）

sentences.sentence: When the Onions are very soft and reduced, turn up the heat so they caramelise, then cook for another 12-15 mins, stirring along the bottom of the pan occasionally to mix in the brown sticky bits.
sentences.translation: 当洋葱充分变软和缩小后，在转大火12到15分钟，不断搅拌底部，使洋葱微微发焦，变成棕色小片。
